title: Spokanistan51
author: Spokanistan51
content: Looking to trade my duplicate CI's1) 2018 CI Phoenix .01 BTC Silver, ICG graded MS69. Serial 64 / 100 made.2) 2017 CI HODL .01 BTC Silver, ICG graded MS66. Serial 96 / 100 made. Many HODL's have hit the open market redeemed recently, so loaded ones are becoming more and more rare.Looking to trade for - BTCC 10k Blue chips- Other CI's that I currently do not have. I already have Pumpkins, Magic Internet $, YARR, Unchained and a few others. Raw and ungraded is fine depending on condition.Escrow via MJ encouraged, PM/DM me with offers. Thanks!Pics:https://imgur.com/a/dbJyHhx

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: HODL statistics:100x coins assembled:1x lost in transit (never funded)17x redeemed82x active (1x double funded)

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.created_time: October 16, 2023, 04:37:56 PMLast edit: October 16, 2023, 04:49:19 PM by Spokanistan51
comments.body: Bump, still looking for trades. Anyone with a Satoshi to the World I would trade a HODL. 82 active left of the HODL now per MJ, maybe less now?

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on September 17, 2023, 12:11:54 PMHODL statistics:100x coins assembled:1x lost in transit (never funded)17x redeemed82x active (1x double funded)Is there any tool to mornitor the Satori coins?

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: goldlyre on October 17, 2023, 03:20:49 AMQuote from: minerjones on September 17, 2023, 12:11:54 PMHODL statistics:100x coins assembled:1x lost in transit (never funded)17x redeemed82x active (1x double funded)Is there any tool to mornitor the Satori coins?There was a homepage called satoritool.xyz by our beloved member yogg!  But this was live 2 years ago?! You still have the chance to fetch all addresses in the following Google Spreadsheet: All Satori Chip AddressesWhat might be easier is to http://satoricoin.co.uk/ - you enter the serial of the specific satori and get infos like txid, public-address and the final balance!Here is an example:

comments.author: Fattcatt
comments.body: What's the population of the Satoshi to the World coins?

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: Fattcatt on October 17, 2023, 06:04:59 AMWhat's the population of the Satoshi to the World coins?  The Satoshi to the World coin has a mintage of 100 units. CryptoImperator released most of his coins back in these days with a mintage of 100.He opened a thread about his releases but it is not up2date right now.More infos about that specific coin can be fund here:[ANN][WTS]From Satoshi to the World Coin SOLD OUT!

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: This is a nice thread for CI release info: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1539742.0

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: If you’re interested in just selling them out right, please send me a DM. I understand you probably only want trades, but I feel it never hurts to ask.  thank you.  3)
